next_steps.note: "Define scope of 'localhost' scan: Specify which ports/services on localhost will be targeted (e.g., common web ports 80/443, database ports, SSH).",
"Select a scanning tool: Research and choose a suitable tool for localhost scanning (e.g., Nmap, masscan, netcat). Document the rationale for the choice.",
"Develop basic scan script/command: Create a simple script or command-line instruction to initiate the initial scan using the chosen tool and defined scope.",
"Document expected results: Before running the scan, document the expected findings (e.g., services running on specific ports) to aid in verification.",
"Run initial scan & log output: Execute the scan and capture the output to a file for analysis.  Note any errors or unusual behavior during execution."
